thread.section_title: sellbackyourBook.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of sellbackyourBook.com | sellbackyourbook.com | 5 of 304
thread.title: Chase

author: Chase
title: Chase
text: I encountered this service through bookscouter.com (also another great resource), and was able to clean out so many books, getting them to a company that can then redistribute them to someone else who can use them. This service was great, and the way you register your books, mail them in, and get money are all as intuitive as can be. Welcome to the future!
